::Aerotaur::
       He wiped her tears gently with his other hand.  "They think it was 
Arrow.  But he's nowhere to be found."

--part1_bc.1dc5da7e.2939abf1_boundary

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::Aerotaur::
<BR>       He wiped her tears gently with his other hand.  "They think it was Arrow.  But he's nowhere to be found."</FONT></HTML>
